pages.text: These blocks will spawn a boss when mined by a player. Using a silk touch pickaxe will allow you to keep the blocks after breaking.
Found inside a $(l:den_o/structures/gaohliner)GaohLiner$(/l)$(br2)Mine this block to summon $(l:den_o/mobs/gaoh)Kamen Rider Gaoh$(/l)
Mine this block to summon $(l:ooo/mobs/poseidon)Kamen Rider Poseidon$(/l)
Found inside the $(l:w/structures/earths_core)Earth's Core$(/l)$(br2)Mine this block to summon $(l:ooo/mobs/core)Kamen Rider Core$(/l)
Mine this block to summon $(l:ooo/mobs/powered_up_core)Powered Up Kamen Rider Core$(/l)
Mine this block to summon $(l:ooo/mobs/ancient_ooo)Ancient OOO$(/l)
Mine this block to summon $(l:ooo/mobs/goda)Kamen Rider Goda$(/l)

Mine this block to summon $(l:wizard/mobs/wiseman)Kamen Rider Wiseman$(/l)

Found inside $(l:build/structures/pandora_tower)Pandora Tower$(/l)$(br2)Mine this block to summon the $(l:build/mobs/stag_lost_smash)Kuwagata,$(/l) $(l:build/mobs/owl_lost_smash)Fukuro,$(/l) and $(l:build/mobs/castle_lost_smash)Castle Lost Smashes$(/l)
Found inside $(l:build/structures/pandora_tower)Pandora Tower$(/l)$(br2)Mine this block to summon $(l:build/mobs/engine_bros)Engine Bros$(/l) and $(l:build/mobs/remocon_bros)Remocon Bros$(/l)
